name: brave
title: Brave
description: Search open tabs, bookmarks and history in Brave.
author: ron-myers

commands.name: search-tab
commands.title: Search Brave Tabs
commands.subtitle: Brave
commands.description: List all tabs and go to the selected.

preferences.name: useOriginalFavicon
preferences.title: Fav icon
preferences.label: Extract the favicon from every open tab
preferences.description: Before enable this, you should enable 'View > Developer > Allow JavaScript from Apple Events' in every Brave profile.

preferences.name: openTabInProfile
preferences.title: Open Tab In Profile
preferences.description: When 'Default(classic), the tab will be opened in the profile open, or topmost profile window if multiple windows are open. When 'Current Profile', the tab will be opened in the profile specified in the 'Profile' field. When 'Original Profile' it will open in original profile tab is sourced from

preferences.name: browserOption
preferences.title: Brave Browser Option
preferences.description: Select the Brave Browser you want to use.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
